label_ids.description: An array of label ids to create a manifest, only available for USPS / Australia Post / StarTrack, will throw error if any label_id does not belong to this shipper_account or cannot be manifested.

created_at_min.description: Start date and time of the record created (format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ, default: 24hrs ago)

created_at_max.description: End date and time of the record created (format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ, default: NOW())
